amendment.description: An amendment numbered 61 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to prohibit violators of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 and their immediate family members from serving on redistricting commissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
